answers.answer: Foods for one may not be good for the other. This varies too if your IBS brings about diarrhea or constipation. You may want to consider working with a dietitian or nutritionist to find the many foods that would be well tolerated by someone with both diabetes and IBS. A Google search using keywords "IBS and diabetes" produced many hits worth looking at.

question: How does my IBS affect my diabetes?
title: IBS and diabetes
